entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
